Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aparthotel Marinda Garden in Ciutadella de Menorca (Cala'n Bosch - Son Xoriguer), you'll be minutes from Macarelleta Beach. This family-friendly aparthotel is within the vicinity of Son Saura Beach and Cathedral of Menorca.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 204 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and sofa beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and bicycles to rent. This aparthotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and supervised childcare/activities. The complimentary beach shuttle makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Aparthotel Marinda Garden. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Aparthotel Marinda Garden. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Macarelleta Beach - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Son Saura Beach - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Cathedral of Menorca - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Plaza de Alfonso III - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Naveta d'Es Tudons - 10 km / 6.2 mi
Cala Mitjana Beach - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi
Algaiarens Beach - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
Santa Agueda Castle - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi
Son Bou Beach - 21.1 km / 13.1 mi
Cala Pregonda - 23 km / 14.3 mi
Monte Toro - 25 km / 15.5 mi

Canutells Beach - 30.1 km / 18.7 mi
Golf Son Parc - 30.1 km / 18.7 mi
Mahon Harbour - 36.5 km / 22.7 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Marinda Garden is Mahon (MAH-Minorca) - 34.4 km / 21.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Marinda Garden is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 102.9 km / 64 mi.
